Uses of Interface
net.viktorc.pp4j.api.Submission

  • Packages that use Submission 
    Package Description
    net.viktorc.pp4j.api  
    net.viktorc.pp4j.impl  

    • Uses of Submission in net.viktorc.pp4j.api

      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.api that return types with arguments of type Submission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Submission<?>> ProcessExecutorService.forceShutdown()
      Kills all the and returns a list of the submissions that have been submitted but never processed.
      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.api with parameters of type Submission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ProcessExecutor.execute(Submission<?> submission)
      Sequentially writes the specified commands to the process and blocks until they are processed.
      default <T> Future<T> ProcessExecutorService.submit(Submission<T> submission)
      Submits the specified submission for execution and returns a Future instance which allows for the cancellation of the submission.
      <T> Future<T> ProcessExecutorService.submit(Submission<T> submission, boolean terminateProcessAfterwards)
      Submits the specified submission for execution and returns a Future instance which allows for the cancellation of the submission.

    • Uses of Submission in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

      Classes in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl that implement Submission 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleSubmission
      A simple implementation of the Submission interface that allows for the specification of the commands to execute and whether the process is to be terminated after the execution of the commands.
